Learning to read Welsh, one Tweet at a time...

Jun 2020

Ymunwch √¢ ni nos yfory a phob nos Fercher rhwng 8 a 9 am Yr Awr Gymraeg. Awr o hyrwyddo a marchnata drwy gyfrwng y Gymraeg.

Ychwanegwch yr hashnod marchnata Cymraeg #yagym i'ch neges ac fe rannwn eich neges a bron i 13,000 o gyfrifon Twitter unigol üëèüèªüëçüèªüè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å∑Û†Å¨Û†Å≥Û†Åø pic.twitter.com/9lG8UF1bAh

— yagymüè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å∑Û†Å¨Û†Å≥Û†Åø Yr Awr Gymraeg (@yrawrgymraeg) June 23, 2020

MY FIRST ATTEMPT

Join us tomorrow night and every Wednesday night ...8 til 9 for The Welsh Hour. An hour of ...and ... ..Welsh. Use the hashtag..'#yagym' ....to....13,000 Twitter....

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Join us tomorrow night and every Wednesday night between 8 and 9 for The Welsh Hour. An hour of promotion and marketing through the medium of Welsh. Add the Welsh marketing hashtag '#yagym' to your message and we'll share your message with 13,000 individual Twitter accounts.

VOCAB

rhwng - between

ychwanegu - add

neges - message

üõç Straeon hyfryd ar @BBCCymruFyw am sut mae siopau llyfrau wedi bod yn codi calon yn ystod y cyfnod clo üíñ#WythnosSiopauLlyfrauAnnibynnol#CefnogiSiopauLlyfrau #CaruDarllen
https://t.co/qMWdRyXeQN

— Cyngor Llyfrau Cymru (@LlyfrauCymru) June 22, 2020

MY FIRST ATTEMPT

Lovely...on @BBCymruFyw about how book shops have been...during the lockdown. '#..BookshopWeek' '#SupportBookShops' '#LoveReading'

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Lovely stories on @BBCymruFyw about how book shops have been cheering us up during the lockdown. '#IndependentBookshopWeek' '#SupportBookShops' '#LoveReading'

VOCAB

straeon - stories

annibynnol - independent

darllen - reading

DIOLCH YN FAWR i bawb sy wedi bod yn cefnogi ni trwy archebu llyfrau ar-lein https://t.co/ghRihUQtqT dros yr wythnosau diwetha.
üìöüëè‚ù§Ô∏èüìöüëè‚ù§Ô∏èüìöüëè‚ù§Ô∏è
Dyn ni ddim yn barod i agor y siop eto felly pl√Æs cadwch i ddefnyddio‚Äôr wefan!#yagym #CefnogiSiopauLlyfrau pic.twitter.com/6fjIbH0Pt0

— Cant a mil (@siopcantamil) June 22, 2020

MY FIRST ATTEMPT

Thankyou to everyone who has been supporting us ...books online through the ...weeks. We are not yet ready to open the shop...please keep using the website!

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Thankyou to everyone who has been supporting us by ordering books online over the last few weeks. We are not yet ready to open the shop yet so please keep using the website!

VOCAB

archeb - order

felly - so

wythnosau diwetha - last few weeks

Gyda mwy o siopau‚Äôn dechrau ailagor o ddydd Llun yng Nghymru, dyma gyfle gwych i ddangos eich cefnogaeth i ganol eich tref leol.

Mae‚Äôn hanfodol ein bod yn para i #ArosYnLleol i #DiogeluCymru rhag y #coronafeirws. #EconomiSylfaenol pic.twitter.com/nR4Iw3fR3z

— Llywodraeth Cymru Economi a Thrafnidiaeth (@LlCEconomi) June 19, 2020

MY FIRST ATTEMPT

With more shops starting to open on Monday in Wales, here is a great opportunity to .... your support for your local center.

CORRECT TRANSLATION

With more shops starting to reopen from Monday in Wales, this is a great opportunity to show your support for your local town center. It is essential that we continue to '#StayLocal' to '#KeepWalesSafe' from the coronavirus '#LocalEconomy'

VOCAB

ailagor - reopen

lleol - local

hanfodol - essential

Gwaedd uchel i rieni a gwarchodwyr sydd yn cefnogi dysgu eu plant drwy chwilio a defnyddio adnoddau Cymraeg! Diolch hefyd i‚Äôr miloedd sy‚Äôn creu cynnwys newydd!Pawen lawen i chi gyd! @mentrauiaith @MudiadMeithrin @Urdd @S4C @cydag_uwchradd @CydagCynradd @AthrawonCymru @eisteddfod

— Rhieni dros Addysg Gymraeg (@RhAG1) June 13, 2020

MY FIRST ATTEMPT

...to parents..who support teaching their children by searching and using...Welsh! Big thanks to ... who ..create new...!...to you ..!

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Shout out to parents and guardians who support their children's learning by searching and using Welsh language resources!Thank you also to the thousands who are creating new content! High Five to you all!

VOCAB

gwaedd uchel - shout out

cynnwys - content

pawen lawen - high five

üåü GWYBODAETH üåü

‚ÑπÔ∏è Gwybodaeth am ble a phryd mae popeth ymlaen!

üó∫Ô∏è Cofiwch ddefnyddio gwefan Tafwyl fel map dydd Sadwrn i‚Äôch tywys i wahanol ardaloedd o‚Äôr ≈µyl. Bydd y wefan yn eich cyfeirio at y platfform priodol bob amser. https://t.co/ftgVFEjMrQ

— Tafwyl (@Tafwyl) June 18, 2020

MY FIRST ATTEMPT

Information about where and when....Remember to use..Tafwyl map on Saturday...in your.....platform.....every time.

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Information on where and when everything is on! Remember to use the Tafwyl website as a map on Saturday to guide you to different areas of the festival. The website will always direct you to the appropriate platform.

VOCAB

popeth - everything

gwefan - website

bob amser - always
